text: Soy milk (also called soymilk, soya milk, soybean milk, soy bean milk, soy drink, or soy beverage) is a milk-like product made from soybeans. Soy milk originated in China where the soybean was native. Later on, the soybean and soybean foods came to Japan. ==Related pages== * Soy milk maker Category:Plant milks
title: Soy milk
